entry.title: Teaching & Research Coding CDI at EM Lyon Business School
entry.summary: Seeking multiple talented, motivated teachers who can explain coding to non-engineers and help with data analytic research.
entry.content:
EM-Lyon Business School is still growing in data science courses. We are seeking talented, motivated teachers who can explain coding to non-engineers, and help with data analytic research. Our primary goal is to find good, empathetic teachers! Candidates with experience using Excel, SQL, and doing business data analytics are especially welcome. We are hiring for multiple positions at different data analytic skill levels.

See our current courses on the Data R&D Institute website here.

A formal description for one post is here but please get in touch even if you don't have all the requested programming expertise.   We have multiple campuses (Paris, St. Etienne, Casablanca), although the bulk of our current courses are in Lyon at the moment. 

You can contact Lynn Cherny at cherny@em-lyon.com for more information.
